column15: Buy original Miraaya Tun-m2295b-m at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
Miraaya Blue Tunic - M2295B-M:
Get ready to earn compliments from your friends for your taste in fashion with this trendy tunic from Miraaya. The design of this tunic is such that it gives the illusion of a wrap-around dress. This tunic is stylised using colourful print at the bottom. Similar print is also used around the boat neck that completes its look beautifully. This tunic from Miraaya will surely make a great addition to your wardrobe.
